samples.jaas

类 UsernameEqualsPasswordLoginModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • samples.jaas.UsernameEqualsPasswordLoginModule
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    javax.security.auth.spi.LoginModule

    public class UsernameEqualsPasswordLoginModule
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.security.auth.spi.LoginModule
    A LoginModule that will allow login if the username equals the password. Upon successful authentication it adds the username as a Principal.
    作者:
    Rob Winch
